content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)
- Lab (position 2.0, 0.0) - currently not powered
- Electricity group (id=4871) with poles at positions (2.5, 2.5) and (0.5, 1.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with coal as fuel, currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with coal as fuel, currently has no ingredients to smelt

### Wooden chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 0.5) with an empty inventory

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new poles
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to an electricity source.

### Errors due to missing ingredients for research
- Make sure to gather the required ingredients (in this case, 10 automation-science-packs) before attempting to complete research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
